user_info.name: State your full name. I won't fight a stranger.
user_info.email: Provide your email address. Even warriors need contact.
user_info.socialnetwork: What’s your social network handle? Show me your online domain.
user_info.address: Where do you reside? Even a prince must know his territory.
user_info.password: Set your password. It better be strong, like a Saiyan’s resolve.
user_info.confirmPassword: Confirm that password. No room for weakness or mistakes.
